name: Kingdom Hearts: The Story So Far
summary: In KINGDOM HEARTS - The Story So Far - Keyblade wielders can relive the magical adventures of Sora, Donald Duck, Goofy and friends as they attempt to stop the Heartless invasion that threatens their universe. Fans will travel to iconic Disney worlds and join forces with beloved Disney and FINAL FANTASY® characters in order to fight back against the threat of darkness and bring back light to all worlds.
storyline:
The compilation includes the following games:

KINGDOM HEARTS FINAL MIX

KINGDOM HEARTS II FINAL MIX

KINGDOM HEARTS HD 2.8 FINAL CHAPTER PROLOGUE
